title: Lemon and dill salmon fillet
ingredients: ['225g baby potatoes, or to taste', '100g fresh green beans, trimmed, or to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '2 salmon fillets', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 sprig chopped fresh dill', '1/2 lemon, sliced', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/3 teaspoon coarse sea salt', 'Tartar Sauce', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 1/2 tablespoons capers, roughly chopped', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
